name: Learning-Content-GET-getContent
description: [Learning] GET /content — Retrieves a collection of learning content.

schema.name: contentType
schema.description: The type of learning content. The learning catalog comprises programs, blended and digital courses, course offerings for blended courses, and stand-alone lessons.

schema.name: lastUpdated
schema.description: When specified, only Learning Content updated since the specified datetime will be returned in the response.

schema.name: lifecycleStatus
schema.description: The current status of the learning content. Possible value is Active or Inactive.

schema.name: limit
schema.description: The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default is 20. The maximum is 100.

schema.name: offset
schema.description: The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection. The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with the 10th object.

schema.name: skills
schema.description: The skills associated with this learning content.

schema.name: topics
schema.description: The group of learning elements that this learning content belongs. Example: Compliance.

name: Learning-Content-GET-getLessons
description: [Learning] GET /content/{ID}/lessons — Retrieves a collection of lessons for a learning content.

schema.name: ID
schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

schema.name: limit
schema.description: The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default is 20. The maximum is 100.

schema.name: offset
schema.description: The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection. The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with the 10th object.

name: Learning-ManageDigitalCourses-POST-postManageDigitalCourses
description: [Learning] POST /manageDigitalCourses — Provides the ability to create and update digital courses. These REST APIs are secured to the initiating actions of the BP.

name: Learning-Content-GET-getContent_1
description: [Learning] GET /content/{ID} — Retrieves a single learning content instance

schema.name: ID
schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

name: Learning-Content-GET-getLessons_1
description: [Learning] GET /content/{ID}/lessons/{subresourceID} — Retrieves a single lesson for a learning content instance

schema.name: ID
schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

schema.name: subresourceID
schema.description: The Workday ID of the subresource.
